tool.name: table rename columns via regex
tool.description: rename columns in a table using regex

param.name: input_dataset
param.label: Input Dataset
param.help: The input dataset in CSV, TSV, tabular, or Parquet format.

param.name: columns
param.label: Columns to Rename
param.help: Select one or more columns from the dataset to rename. You can select columns by their header names.

param.name: regex_check
param.label: Regex to Check For
param.help: The regular expression pattern to search for in the column names. This pattern will be used to identify parts of the column names to be replaced.

param.name: regex_replace
param.label: Regex to Replace With
param.help: The regular expression pattern to replace the matched parts of the column names with. This pattern will be used to rename the columns.

tool.help:
This tool renames columns in a table using the specified regex patterns.
Inputs ------
- **Input Dataset**: The input dataset in CSV, TSV, tabular, or Parquet format. - **Columns to Rename**: Select one or more columns from the dataset to rename. You can select columns by their header names. - **Regex to Check For**: The regular expression pattern to search for in the column names. This pattern will be used to identify parts of the column names to be replaced. - **Regex to Replace With**: The regular expression pattern to replace the matched parts of the column names with. This pattern will be used to rename the columns.
Outputs -------
- **Output Dataset**: The output dataset with the renamed columns.
